Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 131st/Eberhart
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Indiana,134th, Langley, and 131st, due to street blockage near 131st/Eberhart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 130th, Indiana,134th, Langley, and 131st, due to street blockage near 131st/Eberhart.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier fire department activity at Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier fire department activity at Roosevelt. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier fire department activity at Roosevelt.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier fire department activity at Roosevelt. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
